title: Risk
creator_credit: Victorian College of the Arts, School of Film and Television, Hugh Burton and Christian Bernardi
brief_description: Follows the adventures of lovable anti-hero Looi Fresco as he searches for love in a big city. Dressed in a lime green suit his experiences and insights allow him to move beyond the confines of self expression and eccentricity as he shares 11 minutes of sheer risk with us.
creator_credit_for_label: Victorian College of the Arts, School of Film and Television, Hugh Burton and Christian Bernardi
